questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had 1 million euro, I would first give money to associations against cancer or associations like "les restos du coeur" because I think it's very important to help people in the need.
Also, I would give a part to my family to help them to achieve their dreams.
And in my case, I would travel to see the differents wonderful landscapes all around the world and maybe buy a house in south America.
But in reality, I think money is not the best way to be happy. Money can not buy happiness, so... I don't have other idea of what I would do with it.
